work.name: Medtronic Diabetes
work.summary: Software engineer focusing on critical healthcare platform development and authentication systems modernization
highlights: Contribute to User Services team managing mission-critical Medtronic Carelink platform, serving healthcare professionals and patients through integrated web/mobile applications for device management and account services

Optimize performance and reliability of high-traffic PostgreSQL database and Redis cache systems, while maintaining API functionality through comprehensive Postman testing and JBoss deployment protocols
Collaborate on migration of legacy authentication system to Auth0 platform, implementing global Single Sign-On (SSO) solution to enhance security and user experience across international markets

work.name: Amazon Web Services
work.summary: Enhanced AWS Lambda's Concurrency Limit Management Service (CLMS) to optimize ARM-based workload management and customer concurrency limits
highlights: Authored and received approval for technical design documentation detailing CLMS workflow improvements and architectural changes to support ARM workload integration
Implemented approved design using Java and Dagger2 DI framework, incorporating sophisticated SQL queries for Lambda metrics analysis
Established robust quality assurance through comprehensive unit testing with JUnit and Mockito frameworks, ensuring reliable deployment through CI/CD pipeline

work.name: Encyclop√¶dia Britannica
work.summary: Researched and implemented advanced search and recommendation strategies for content discovery optimization
highlights: Conducted comparative analysis of search engine technologies to identify optimal solutions for internal database querying
Explored and implemented two distinct search approaches using Sphinx and Elasticsearch/Kibana to evaluate their effectiveness for article discovery
Developed recommendation system strategies to improve content accessibility and user engagement

work.name: Wolfram Research
work.summary: Specialized in Korean language integration for Wolfram Alpha's computational knowledge engine
highlights: Developed and refined Korean Natural Language Processing systems, enabling accurate parsing and computation of Korean language queries
Created comprehensive test suite by translating and adapting example queries into Korean, ensuring parsing accuracy and computational reliability
Conducted systematic debugging and optimization of Korean language processing capabilities to enhance query accuracy

projects.name: Personal Portfolio Website
projects.summary: Developed and maintain a personal portfolio website to showcase projects and skills
highlights: Integration with GitHub for project updates
